name: Sowbug
descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) is a threat group that has conducted targeted attacks against organizations in South America and Southeast Asia, particularly government entities, since at least 2015. (Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

subtechniques.name: Archive via Utility
subtechniques.descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) extracted documents and bundled them into a RAR archive.(Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

subtechniques.name: Windows Command Shell
subtechniques.descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) has used command line during its intrusions.(Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

technique_table_data.name: Data from Network Shared Drive
technique_table_data.descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) extracted Word documents from a file server on a victim network.(Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

technique_table_data.name: File and Directory Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) identified and extracted all Word documents on a server by using a command containing * .doc and *.docx. The actors also searched for documents based on a specific date range and attempted to identify all installed software on a victim.(Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

subtechniques.name: Keylogging
subtechniques.descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) has used keylogging tools.(Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

subtechniques.name: Match Legitimate Resource Name or Location
subtechniques.descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) named its tools to masquerade as Windows or Adobe Reader software, such as by using the file name adobecms.exe and the directory CSIDL_APPDATA\microsoft\security.(Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

technique_table_data.name: Network Share Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) listed remote shared drives that were accessible from a victim.(Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

technique_table_data.name: OS Credential Dumping
technique_table_data.descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) has used credential dumping tools.(Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

technique_table_data.name: System Information Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Sowbug](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0054) obtained OS version and hardware configuration from a victim.(Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

techniques.name: Masquerading
techniques.sub_name: Match Legitimate Resource Name or Location

techniques.name: Masquerading
techniques.sub_name: Match Legitimate Resource Name or Location

Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017.description: Symantec Security Response. (2017, November 7). Sowbug: Cyber espionage group targets South American and Southeast Asian governments. Retrieved November 16, 2017.
